item.title: @elonmusk: ELON MUSK: "Making life multiplanetary expands the scope & scale of consciousness. Starship is the o...
item.description: ELON MUSK: "Making life multiplanetary expands the scope & scale of consciousness. Starship is the only way for us to become a multiplanet civilization." -@elonmusk

item.title: @elonmusk: We must get to Mars to ensure the long term consciousness of humanity. Made with Grok Imagine
item.description: We must get to Mars to ensure the long term consciousness of humanity. Made with Grok Imagine

item.title: @elonmusk: grok imagine: ethereal dark fantasy female figure with long flowing hair, wearing an intricate metal...
item.description: grok imagine: ethereal dark fantasy female figure with long flowing hair, wearing an intricate metallic crown with sharp antler-like protrusions, eyes closed in serene expression, pale skin glowing softly. Her lower arms and torso are transforming into glossy black liquid metal with reflective chrome details, sharp claw-like fingers emerging from the darkness. Dramatic backlighting creating a halo effect around her head, cool blue-toned misty atmosphere, cinematic lighting, highly detailed, surreal and elegant, dark fantasy aesthetic.

item.title: @elonmusk: This picture was taken on Mars last week.
item.description: This picture was taken on Mars last week.

item.title: @elonmusk: "The United States of America has successfully carried out a large scale strike against Venezuela an...
item.description: "The United States of America has successfully carried out a large scale strike against Venezuela and its leader, President Nicolas Maduro, who has been, along with his wife, captured and flown out of the Country. This operation was done in conjunction with U.S. Law Enforcement. Details to follow. There will be a News Conference today at 11 A.M., at Mar-a-Lago. Thank you for your attention to this matter! President DONALD J. TRUMP"

item.title: @elonmusk: Now for the find out part of FAFO
item.description: Now for the find out part of FAFO

item.title: @elonmusk: The president offered multiple off ramps, but was very clear throughout this process: the drug traff...
item.description: The president offered multiple off ramps, but was very clear throughout this process: the drug trafficking must stop, and the stolen oil must be returned to the United States. Maduro is the newest person to find out that President Trump means what he says. Kudos to our brave special operators who pulled off a truly impressive operation.
